name: com.meta.passthroughcameraaccess
description: This package provides access to raw image data from the headset sensors to your Unity application using WebCamTexture object.

samples.description: Show how to use WebCamTexture object with Quest3 device using C#/Unity.
Show how to use camera data to estimate the current light brightness in the room.
Show how to use camera intrinsics and extrinsics data to transform 2D camera image coordinates into 3D position in world.
